forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 64F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.
